Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UTCStartTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UTCStartTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FullPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DisplayName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AppVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AppType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TSSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Pid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nFiles" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="File" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="nFiles"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FullPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DisplayName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AppVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AppType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TSSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Pid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nFiles" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="File" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="nFiles"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nFiles" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nRegProcs" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nRegServices" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Files" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="nFiles"/> <data name="RegProcs" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="nRegProcs"/> <data name="RegServices" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="nRegServices"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nApplications" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Applications" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="nApplications"/> <data name="dwRebootReasons" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Application or service '%3' could not be shut down.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FullPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DisplayName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AppVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AppType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TSSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Pid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nFiles" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="File" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="nFiles"/> </template>

Event.Message: Application or service '%3' could not be restarted.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FullPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DisplayName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AppVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AppType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TSSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Pid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nFiles" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="File" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="nFiles"/> </template>

Event.Message: Restart Manager encountered an internal error.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="cbSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="pbBinary" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="cbSize"/> </template>

Event.Message: Service tagging failed to find target service in process %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SvcHostPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nFiles" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nServices" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="nFiles"/> <data name="Service" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="nServices"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RmSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Pid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FullPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DisplayName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AppVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AppType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TSSessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
